content:
Since you give Max his joint supplement daily, you're likely already in the habit of doing it every morning with his food. However, it's still a good idea to keep track of the supply and reorder when necessary to avoid running out.

Let's set a reminder to review Max's joint supplement supply in about 2-3 weeks to ensure you have enough stock. This will give you time to reorder before you run out.

Here's the updated list:

* Order Luna's grain-free wet food in blue packets in 4-5 days
* Upcoming vet appointments (waiting for dates and times from you)
* Luna's medication schedule (waiting for details from you)
* Max's flea and tick prevention medication application: due in 7-10 days
* Review Max's joint supplement supply in 2-3 weeks

Feel free to adjust the reminder timeframe based on your usage and supplier's shipping times.

Now that we've got all these reminders in place, you can relax knowing you've got everything covered for your fur babies, Luna and Max!
